alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Northern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 09 at 2:51PM EDT until April 10 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Greater Pickens, Central Greenville and Northern Spartanburg Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The urban areas right around Greenville, Spartanburg, and Easley will most likely remain above freezing, but the outlying areas will get down to freezing, along with widespread frost.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Northern Spartanburg
